page.title: 08Mrs Hardwick The Chuchwarden
page.content: The church warden has the power to keep order in the church and churchyard and to assist the priest in every way. She gets everything ready for services , cleans up, and when the chrch is not in use, it has to be locked up. To get the post of churchwarden Mrs Hardwick had to be elected. She has been woking at the church for twenty-seven years, four of those as churchwarden. There are not many foreign visitors to the church and only about three funerals, marriages and christenings are held at the church every year. To help with repairs to the church (such as holes in windows), the Womens Institute donate money fron a covenant.
